array.string: Working knowledge in programming languages such as C/C++, Objective C, Swift and Ruby.
Basic knowledge in programming languages such as R, Python and Java.
Experience in Agile Software Development methodologies such as Scrum and XP.
Basic knowledge in using big data and machine learning analytics on applications.
Student at BEPiD (Brazilian Educational Program of iOS Developers), an innovative program do qualify graduationi students to develop for iOS.
Worked as web developer in a open source project whose goal is the creation of a Web Conference System.
Member of the Mobilicare Project, a management system health to pacients with chronic diseases.
Development of an urban network that simulated the city traffic problems and created solutions for them.
Studies Computer Science since March 2012 at Universidade Federal do Rio Grande do Sul (UFRGS), one of the best universities of the country.
